title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as "foo.txt")
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose 'Zip File' option to export
4. <Missing Step>
EB: When exporting the projects to a zip file, if there are multiple files with the same name under different directories, the zip file fails to store all the files. In this case, when creating two files named 'foo.txt' under different projects, only one file appears in the exported zip file.
SR:
Continue with the following steps:

4. <Missing Step>
